displayName.english: Abandon all hope, ye who enter here
displayName.german: Lasst alle Hoffnung fahren, die ihr eintretet
displayName.french: Abandonnez tout espoir, vous qui entrez
displayName.spanish: Abandonad toda esperanza, vosotros que entráis
displayName.schinese: 进入此处者，放弃一切希望
displayName.tchinese: 進入此處者，放棄一切希望
displayName.russian: Отбросьте всякую надежду, вы, входящие сюда
displayName.japanese: 入る者よ、すべての希望を捨てよ
displayName.polish: Odrzućcie wszelką nadzieję, wy, którzy wchodzicie
displayName.turkish: Buraya girenler, bütün ümidi terk edin
displayName.brazilian: Abandone toda esperança, vós que entrais

description.french: Vous êtes entré dans le non-lieu.
description.japanese: あなたはノンプレイスに足を踏み入れた.

description.english: You have unlocked the sandbox mode.
description.french: Vous avez débloqué le mode bac à sable.
description.japanese: サンドボックスモードを解除した.

description.english: The journey continues, an unfinished melody awaits...
description.german: Die Reise geht weiter, eine unvollendete Melodie wartet...
description.french: Le voyage continue, une mélodie inachevée vous attend...
description.italian: Il viaggio continua, una melodia incompiuta ti attende...
description.spanish: El viaje continúa, una melodía inconclusa te espera...
description.schinese: 旅程仍在继续，一首未完成的旋律等待着你...
description.tchinese: 旅程仍在繼續，一首未完成的旋律等待著你...
description.japanese: 旅は続く、未完成の旋律があなたを待っている...
description.turkish: Yolculuk devam ediyor, tamamlanmamış bir melodi seni bekliyor...
description.brazilian: A jornada continua, uma melodia inacabada aguarda...

description.english: A whisper in the void, a silent victory.
description.german: Ein Flüstern in der Leere, ein stiller Sieg.
description.french: Un murmure dans le vide, une victoire silencieuse.
description.italian: Un sussurro nel vuoto, una vittoria silenziosa.
description.spanish: Un susurro en el vacío, una victoria silenciosa.
description.schinese: 虚空中的低语，寂静的胜利.
description.tchinese: 虛空中的低語，一場寂靜的勝利.
description.japanese: 虚無のささやき、静かな勝利.
description.turkish: Boşlukta bir fısıltı, sessiz bir zafer.
description.brazilian: Um sussurro no vazio, uma vitória silenciosa.

description.english: You've reached the end of your time. You wouldn't want to be here.
description.german: Du hast das Ende deiner Zeit erreicht. Du würdest hier nicht sein wollen.
description.french: Vous avez atteint la fin de votre temps. Vous ne souhaiteriez pas être ici.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto la fine del tuo tempo. Non vorresti essere qui.
description.koreana: 당신은 당신의 시간의 끝에 도달했습니다. 여기에 머물고 싶지 않았을 것입니다.
description.spanish: Has alcanzado el fin de tu tiempo. No querrías estar aquí.
description.schinese: 你的时间已走到尽头。你无意待在这里.
description.tchinese: 你的時間已走到盡頭。你不想留在這裡.
description.russian: Ты достиг конца своего времени. Ты бы не хотел здесь быть.
description.japanese: あなたは自分の時間の終わりに達した。ここに居たいとは思わなかっただろう.
description.polish: Osiągnąłeś koniec swojego czasu. Nie chciałbyś tu być.
description.turkish: Zamanının sonuna geldin. Burada olmak istemezdin.
description.brazilian: Você alcançou o fim do seu tempo. Você não gostaria de estar aqui.

description.english: You danced on the edge of danger.
description.german: Du hast am Rande der Gefahr getanzt.
description.french: Vous avez dansé sur le fil du danger.
description.italian: Hai danzato sul bordo del pericolo.
description.tchinese: 你在危險的邊緣翩翩起舞.
description.japanese: あなたは危険の縁で踊った.
description.brazilian: Você dançou na beira do perigo.

displayName.japanese: 解き放たれたヴェール

description.english: What was hidden now breathes. The veil yields.
description.turkish: Gizlenen şey şimdi nefes alıyor. Örtü teslim oluyor.
description.italian: Ciò che era nascosto ora respira. Il velo si arrende.
description.brazilian: O que estava oculto agora respira. O véu cede.
description.german: Was verborgen war, atmet nun. Der Schleier weicht.
description.spanish: Lo que estaba oculto ahora respira. El velo cede.
description.french: Ce qui était caché respire maintenant. Le voile cède.
description.russian: То, что было скрыто, теперь дышит. Покров уступает.
description.koreana: 숨겨졌던 것이 이제 숨쉬기 시작한다. 베일이 물러난다.
description.schinese: 曾被隐藏的现在呼吸起来。纱幕退却.
description.tchinese: 曾經隱藏的如今吐息。面紗退去.
description.japanese: 隠されていたものが今、息をする。ヴェールが解かれる.
description.polish: To, co było ukryte, teraz oddycha. Welon ustępuje.

displayName.spanish: Más Allá del Umbral de la Eternidad

description.english: Ashes remain. Silence holds the truth.
description.italian: Rimangono le ceneri. Il silenzio custodisce la verità.
description.brazilian: Restam cinzas. O silêncio guarda a verdade.
description.german: Asche bleibt zurück. Schweigen birgt die Wahrheit.
description.spanish: Quedan cenizas. El silencio guarda la verdad.
description.french: Les cendres demeurent. Le silence recèle la vérité.
description.schinese: 灰烬犹存。沉默蕴藏着真理.
description.tchinese: 灰燼猶存。寂靜蘊藏著真相.
description.japanese: 灰が残る。沈黙が真実を抱く.
